notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription:
Solve the inequality <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>8</mn>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mn>3</mn>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>12</mn>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
  <mo>≥<!-- ≥ --></mo>
  <mn>7</mn>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>28</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">8p + 3(p - 12) \geq 7p - 28</annotation></semantics></math>, graph the solution on the number line, and write the solution in interval notation.
